channel.title: lunr.js on STEM Notes
channel.description: Recent content in lunr.js on STEM Notes

item.title: Search: Lunr.js
item.description: Configure Lunr.js Search Client Select Lunr.js as the search client in your config.toml file: [params.search] client = "lunr" Generate Search Index for Lunr.js Lunr.js will need a search index for searching across your site. So, you’ll need to generate that search index for Lunr.js before you deploy your site. Engimo comes with a script for generating the search index for Lunr.js: /scripts/generate-search-index-lunr.js. Install Dependencies Node.js must be installed on your system for using the generator script.
